```{r}
# import libraries
library(rafalib)
```

```{r}
par(bg=1, fg="white")

n <- 10  # originally 50

x <- 0.5
y <- 0.5
z <- "|-o-|"
s <- cbind(runif(10), runif(10))
m <- c(-1, 1) / 20

while(TRUE) {
  rafalib::nullplot(xaxt="n", yaxt="n", bty="n")
  points(s, pch=".")
  text(x, y, z, cex=4)
  x <- pmin(pmax(x + sample(m, 1), 0), 1)
  y <- pmin(pmax(y + sample(m, 1), 0), 1)
}
```
